TopicTitle: [0.23.5] Freezer System v. 0.3 for Planet Factory CE

Articles.Content:
https://www./?hggorovov7hocha

Includes one gas giant and three moons around it:

Freezer, the gas giant

Slipper, moon 1

Icy, moon 2

Titania, moon 3, has a 350km atmosphere and the ASL gravity is 5g. A bit like the conceptual 'Gas planet 4' proposed by NovaSilisko.

Known bugs:

None!

Images:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Changelog:

v0.1: Intital release

v0.2: Titania added, bug with Slipper in map view fixed

v0.3: Garlic added, lighting bug fixed, Icy bugs fixed. I will never probably get to fixing the atmo bug on Titania.

do me a favor, post your config files

There you go.
Just downloaded v2. When I check it out tomorrow I will post a comment. I hope you are still working on it, adding planets.

I found the time to install your little system today. You did a great job, they look fantastic! Titania with the valleys and high areas. Freezer and Icy look good too. Slipper looks awesome! They all look great but slipper is the best to me. I'm leaving your system installed because I am headed to Slipper on my next mission.

Looking forward to your next update!!

Just landed on Slipper with a rover. I really like where you located your system. It's a great planet with a nice view of Freezer, nicely done. Maybe I can touch down on Titania, but I have to leave the rover here.
